title: My Personal Shop Bug
body:
So when I went to open my shop i found that three of the skins were bugged. High noon yasuo was supposedly 1950rp on the market. frosted ezreal was supposedly 1400rp on the market and the on sale value was more than the actual skins cost. snow day ziggs was supposedly 1855 on the market. this sucks alot because only three of the things on my shop are legit. 
If a riot employee sees this please fix my shop.{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body: Hey this is really weird, I looked into this for you and seeing correct results.  Nothing out of the ordinary.  High Noon Yasuo is 70% off, Frosted Ezreal 50%, and Snow Day Ziggs at 50%.  When you get a chance, relog in case something went out of sync and toss me some screenshots if this is still a problem.

I don't see anyway to post a screenshot but it says that Frosted Ezreal in 1400 usually and that the discount price is 700rp and that High noon Yasuo is 1950rp and is on sale for 584rp and The ziggs skin is worth 1855rp and is on sale for 927rp.
